summary: This is a female standalone Robe mod, craftable under leather catagory.
descriptionHtml:
Edhildils Sexy Sorceress Robes
Author: Edhildil
5,21,2013
version 1
Standing by itself, and lonely 



Please read all description before you post comment, make sure of familiar...

Description:
===================

This is a female standalone Robe mod, I made it from scratch, flour, and bacon, with Calientes CBBE body.

The lowerbody has been enhanced in the derrier region (buttock)
for a fuller, rounder profile. The waist is somewhat thinner.

Pretty high resolution textures (2048 x 2048) low computers don\'t like it.

Craftable under leather catagory. Nine different colors. Bacon strips and jerky. I mean,
leather strips and leather, oops.

Man version is monk robe, sorry, ok for modders convert for/to sexy boys, not me, so it\'s good.

Feel free to apply enchantments in game, if you are not already.

 Required:
====================

Latest Skyrim 1.9

Calientes Big Bottem Edition v 3.2 -You\'ll need this for all the body textures and hand, feet, face/head meshes, etc.

*******

Open mind. Perhaps not so lore friendly, they are kinda disco, so what, I like it. Very Magic.
 
 Install:
====================

1)Unzip the file to a temporary folder and read the contents. (you are doing that now, but check file folder path)

copy/paste the data folder into your \"skyrim\" folder
(without the quotes). Activate the .esp 

 uninstall:
====================

delete included files and esp 

Even though I thought I got the Skyrim supported version of NifSkope,
it will not show me the dismemberment vertices,(AARGH!)so I may have the 
dismemberments off, I will fix this when I can figure out the dismemberment vertices.

Credits:
===================

Caliente (CBBE body)
Edhildil (New Armor meshes and textures)

Appreciate:
===================

You, them, everybody teach me, game people, Not broken computer...ever.

Tools:
========================
Blender
Gimp 2
Nifskope
CK
my brain, eyes, and hands

Cheers!

-E

If you want to use my meshes in your mod please give the proper credits listed in your mod readme/description. It would also be nice if you sent me a link so I can check out your mod.
author: Edhildil
